com.linecorp.armeria.client.zookeeper

Class ZooKeeperEndpointGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.client.zookeeper.ZooKeeperEndpointGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EndpointGroup, SafeCloseable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ZooKeeperEndpointGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements EndpointGroup
    A ZooKeeper-based EndpointGroup implementation. This EndpointGroup retrieves the list of Endpoints from a ZooKeeper depending on ZooKeeperEndpointGroup.Mode and updates it when the children of the zNode changes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ZooKeeperEndpointGroup.Mode
      Value store type.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ZooKeeperEndpointGroup(java.lang.String zkConnectionStr, java.lang.String zNodePath, int sessionTimeout, NodeValueCodec nodeValueCodec, ZooKeeperEndpointGroup.Mode mode)
      Create a ZooKeeper-based EndpointGroup, endpoints will be retrieved from a node's all children's node value or a node's value depending on value store type ZooKeeperEndpointGroup.Mode.
      ZooKeeperEndpointGroup(java.lang.String zkConnectionStr, java.lang.String zNodePath, int sessionTimeout, ZooKeeperEndpointGroup.Mode mode)
      Create a ZooKeeper-based EndpointGroup, endpoints will be retrieved from a node's all children's node value or a node's value depending on value store type ZooKeeperEndpointGroup.Mode.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZooKeeperEndpointGroup

        public ZooKeeperEndpointGroup(java.lang.String zkConnectionStr,
                              java.lang.String zNodePath,
                              int sessionTimeout,
                              ZooKeeperEndpointGroup.Mode mode)
        Create a ZooKeeper-based EndpointGroup, endpoints will be retrieved from a node's all children's node value or a node's value depending on value store type ZooKeeperEndpointGroup.Mode.
        Parameters:
        zkConnectionStr - a connection string containing a comma separated list of host:port pairs, each corresponding to a ZooKeeper server
        zNodePath - a zNode path e.g. "/groups/productionGroups"
        sessionTimeout - Zookeeper session timeout in milliseconds
        mode - where data was stored, as a node value or as a node's all children

      • ZooKeeperEndpointGroup

        public ZooKeeperEndpointGroup(java.lang.String zkConnectionStr,
                              java.lang.String zNodePath,
                              int sessionTimeout,
                              NodeValueCodec nodeValueCodec,
                              ZooKeeperEndpointGroup.Mode mode)
        Create a ZooKeeper-based EndpointGroup, endpoints will be retrieved from a node's all children's node value or a node's value depending on value store type ZooKeeperEndpointGroup.Mode.
        Parameters:
        zkConnectionStr - a connection string containing a comma separated list of host:port pairs, each corresponding to a ZooKeeper server
        zNodePath - a zNode path e.g. "/groups/productionGroups"
        sessionTimeout - Zookeeper session timeout in milliseconds
        nodeValueCodec - the nodeValueCodec
        mode - where data was stored, as a node value or as a node's all children
